tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE logistics_performance (
    delivery_id INT,
    delivery_date DATE,
    delivery_time TIME,
    delivery_status VARCHAR(50),
    delivery_location VARCHAR(100),
    bottlenecks_identified VARCHAR(200),
    action_taken VARCHAR(200)
)

CREATE TABLE bottleneck_identification (
    delivery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    delivery_date TIMESTAMP,
    delivery_person_id INT,
    delivery_location VARCHAR(255),
    delivery_item_id INT,
    delivery_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE performance_improvement (
    improvement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    improvement_date TIMESTAMP,
    improvement_strategy VARCHAR(255),
    improvement_result VARCHAR(255),
    delivery_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (delivery_id) REFERENCES bottleneck_identification(delivery_id)
);

CREATE TABLE delivery_log (
  delivery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  delivery_status VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE bottlenecks (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id INT,
    delivery_date DATE,
    bottleneck_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    order_date DATE,
    delivery_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(10,2),
    weight DECIMAL(5,2)
)

CREATE TABLE delivery_personnel (
    personnel_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    personnel_name VARCHAR(50),
    assigned_orders INT,
    current_location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE logistics_performance (
    lp_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id INT,
    delivery_time INTERVAL,
    status VARCHAR(20)
)
